properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from South Santee River to Edisto Beach SC out 20 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 7 at 4:36PM EST until February 7 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Charleston SC
properties.description:
* WHAT...West winds 15 to 25 kt with gusts up to 30 kt and seas 4
to 6 ft expected.

* WHERE...South Santee River to Edisto Beach out 20 NM.

* WHEN...Until 10 PM EST this evening.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM EST THIS EVENING... ...GALE WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 5 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON
